headline: Here's what permanent daylight saving time would mean for Arizona
author: Caylee Scott
sentences: Since the Pacific coast states move to Mountain Standard Time during daylight saving time, which is Arizona's permanent time zone, Arizona would always be aligned with those states instead of being an hour ahead of them during the winter months if the bill is signed into law.
